document_data.name: Henna
document_data.mainbody: '''Henna''' was a southern plant that was most commonly used to produce red [[dye]], which was used in body decoration and textiles.

Usages.Magic: A drop of henna was a [[material component]] that could be used to cast the ''[[eagle's splendor]]'' [[spell]].{{Cite dragon/282/Countdown to the Forgotten Realms: Magic of Faerûn|24}}

document_data.Notable Users: * [[Myrna Cassalanter]], a noblewoman of Waterdeep in the 14{{th}} century DR who dyed her hair bright red with henna.{{Cite dragon/259/Rogues Gallery: Dream Spheres|62}}
